body_html:
file size too big like 32225296 Jul 5 09:51 mnist.zip so not allow me to upload.
here is where how I build
#https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor#walkthrough
1.
pip install tensor2tensor or use setup.py if you have problem

t2t-trainer --generate_data --data_dir=/t2t_data --output_dir=/t2t_train/mnist --problem=image_mnist --model=shake_shake --hparams_set=shake_shake_quick --train_steps=1000 --eval_steps=100

/home/frankzhu/TestPrj/tensor2tensor/tensor2tensor/bin/t2t-trainer
--generate_data
--data_dir=~/t2t_data
--output_dir=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist
--problem=image_mnist
--model=shake_shake
--hparams_set=shake_shake_quick
--train_steps=1000
--eval_steps=100
--profile

bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph
--input_graph=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist/graph.pbtxt
--input_checkpoint=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist/model.ckpt-1000
--input_binary=false
--output_graph=/data/frankzhu/tmp/mnist.pb
--output_node_names=save/restore_shard_1

here I don't know if "--output_node_names=save/restore_shard_1" is correct but without that, there will be error like "You need to supply the name of a node to --output_node_names."

body:
file size too big like  32225296 Jul  5 09:51 mnist.zip so not allow me to upload. 
here is where how I build
#https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor#walkthrough
1.
pip install tensor2tensor or use setup.py if you have problem


t2t-trainer   --generate_data   --data_dir=~/t2t_data   --output_dir=~/t2t_train/mnist   --problem=image_mnist   --model=shake_shake   --hparams_set=shake_shake_quick   --train_steps=1000   --eval_steps=100

/home/frankzhu/TestPrj/tensor2tensor/tensor2tensor/bin/t2t-trainer \
  --generate_data \
  --data_dir=~/t2t_data \
  --output_dir=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist \
  --problem=image_mnist \
  --model=shake_shake \
  --hparams_set=shake_shake_quick \
  --train_steps=1000 \
  --eval_steps=100 \
  --profile

bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph \
  --input_graph=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist/graph.pbtxt\
  --input_checkpoint=/data/frankzhu/tmp/t2t_train/mnist/model.ckpt-1000 \
  --input_binary=false \
  --output_graph=/data/frankzhu/tmp/mnist.pb \
  --output_node_names=save/restore_shard_1 

here I don't know if  "--output_node_names=save/restore_shard_1" is correct but without that, there will be error like "You need to supply the name of a node to --output_node_names."
